text.__SUMMARY__:
Inga marginata is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae.
It is native to Bolivia, Brazil,  and Argentina. It is found in the Atlantic Forest ecoregion.
text.See also: List of plants of Atlantic Forest vegetation of Brazil
